title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Advanced Language Leadership Development Course Using Collaborative Teaching Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language skills and managerial work experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively solve complex language-related workplace problems through problem-based learning scenarios
Learners can apply case-based instructional methods to analyze language barrier cases occurring in real corporate environments and propose improvement strategies
Learners can collaborate with team members to design language education modules and incorporate evaluation feedback through design-based learning activities
Learners can observe senior managers' language leadership cases using a cognitive apprenticeship model and practice through role-playing

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
